title: What are some of the career options other than a traditional School teacher if you are interested in 'English'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there! I think that a nice alternative to the traditional school setting is teaching English online. I work for iTutorGroup as a teacher and recruiter, but there are several other great companies to look in to. They all have their own qualities and pros and cons, but are a nice alternative to working in a traditional school setting. Good luck!
Hi, English teaching has now more avenues than ever. Starting with online courses, english learning centers, personal english tutoring etc Hope this helps!
